messages.content: What is the purpose of comfyui-group-selection?
comfyui-group-selection is a feature in ComfyUI that allows users to create a new group of nodes for easier management and manipulation.
What are the main features of comfyui-group-selection?
The main features of comfyui-group-selection include the ability to select nodes in a group and bypass nodes in a group.
How can users create a new group using comfyui-group-selection?
To create a new group using comfyui-group-selection, users need to select the desired nodes and press Ctrl + 0-9.
How can users select nodes within a group in comfyui-group-selection?
To select nodes within a group in comfyui-group-selection, users need to press the corresponding number key (0-9) for the desired group.
What is the function of double pressing the number keys (0-9) in comfyui-group-selection?
Double pressing the number keys (0-9) in comfyui-group-selection allows users to bypass the nodes in the corresponding group.
How many groups can be created using comfyui-group-selection?
comfyui-group-selection allows users to create up to 10 groups, which can be accessed using the number keys 0-9.
Is it possible to select multiple nodes within a group in comfyui-group-selection?
Yes, users can select multiple nodes within a group in comfyui-group-selection by pressing the corresponding number key (0-9) for the desired group.
